detail.description: Hitachi Energy India Ltd (formerly known as ABB Power Products and Systems India Ltd.) was created in 2019 as a Joint Venture between Hitachi and ABB's Power Grids. The company serves utility and industry customers, with a complete range of engineering, products, solutions, and services in areas of Power technology. [1][2]
